name: Paul Sauer 2013
description: Regarded as a SA ‘first growth’ Bordeaux-style blend, traditionally Cabernet-based with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, as in 2013. Reflects vintage’s bright fruit; elegantly spiced Cabernet berries. Fresher, less muscular than 2012 but no shortage of potential.' - Platter's SA Wine Guide 4.5*, 2017
